newsitem.title: USA: Mosinee Paper to acquire B&J Supply Inc.
newsitem.headline: Mosinee Paper to acquire B&J Supply Inc.

text.p: Mosinee Paper Corp said Wednesday it agreed in principle to buy the net assets of B&J Supply Inc of Appleton, Wis. Terms were not disclosed.
A converter and supplier of school papers sold nationwide, B&J Supply had sales of about $25 million in 1996. It also does contract converting for other producers of paper products.

Mosinee president Daniel Olvey said the acquisition "opens the school supply market for the paper products produced by our specialty paper division. It also gives us new sheet production capability to complement our roll converting."
